text: Adams laughing Carroll Edward Adams Jr. (June 7, 1923 - May 12, 1970) was an American brigadier general who was one of the highest-ranked American military officers killed during the Vietnam War. He was the commander of 937th Engineer Group. Adams was killed in the same UH-1 helicopter crash as Major General John A. B. Dillard. He is aircraft commander of the helicopter. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1923 births Category:1970 deaths Category:American military personnel killed in the Vietnam War Category:Brigadier generals Category:United States Army generals
title: Carroll Edward Adams
